edu.ncsu.csc.coffee_maker.models.persistent

Class Inventory

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc.coffee_maker.models.persistent.DomainObject<Inventory>
      • edu.ncsu.csc.coffee_maker.models.persistent.Inventory

  • @Entity
 @Validated
public class Inventory
extends DomainObject<Inventory>
    Inventory for the coffee maker. Inventory is tied to the database using Hibernate libraries.
    Author:
    Kai Presler-Marshall, Michelle Lemons, Elizabeth Gilbert, Sarah Heckman

        Returns:
        true if recipe is made.
